document_data.name: Sustain
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sustain''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: A shugenja was able to cast this spell on themselves or another creature. Until the spell expired, the individual was able to go without food or water. They did not feel hunger or thirst. After the spell expired, there was no ill effects. If this spell was cast on a starving creature, they suddenly felt as if they had been eating a regular meal every six hours.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required [[material component]]s, a rice cake and a flask of warm [[sake]].
